page.title: Apple Time Capsule A1470 (3 TB, ME182LL/A)

revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Apple |model=A1470 |revision=(3 TB, ME182LL/A) |upc=885909707850 |asin=B00DBDM934;DE; |price=400 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |est_release_date=06/11/2013 |fcc_date=06/10/2013 |fcc_id=BCGA1470 |ic_id=579C-A1470 |pcb_id= |type=base station, NAS |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM53019;BCM53019A1; |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT25Q256A |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC4G63AFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=CMOS battery |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|3x3 MIMO Base Station}} The FCC test report indicates the firmware used during testing was 6.10.56.166. :Transmit beam forming is supported on 802.11ac *[http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/AirPort+Time+Capsule+A1470+%28Mini!%29+Teardown/15067/1 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] ==Comparison==
